title: Online Critical Thinking and Collaborative Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A training course for current secondary school teachers to promote critical thinking and collaborative learning in smartphone-based online environments.

learning_goals: Learners analyze diverse perspectives and provide critical feedback in online discussion forums.
Learners synthesize peer feedback through blogging to propose creative educational solutions.
Learners foster a collaborative learning environment within a flexible schedule using asynchronous communication tools.

resources: Google Docs/Notion and Other Collaboration Tools
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
